official-title.#text: To require the continuation of tuition assistance programs for members of the Armed Forces for the remainder of fiscal year 2013.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text: Requirement for continuation of authorized tuition assistance programs for members of the Armed Forces for remainder of fiscal year 2013

text.#text: The Secretaries of the military departments shall carry out tuition assistance programs for members of the Armed Forces during the remainder of fiscal year 2013 using amounts specified in
The minimum amount used by the Secretary of a military department for tuition assistance for members of an Armed Force under the jurisdiction of that Secretary pursuant to

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: for tuition assistance programs for members of that Armed Force, minus
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013

text.#text: the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 251A of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251A

text.#text: an amount that is not more than the percentage of the reduction required to the Operation and Maintenance account for that Armed Force for fiscal year 2013 by the budget sequester required by

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 1265 IH: To require the continuation of tuition assistance programs for members of the Armed Forces for the remainder of fiscal year 2013.
